content.text: Logging in: {user} (ID: {id})
Polling for points: {name}
Giving {name} (ID: {id}) {points} Points for being inside {guild_name}'s voice channels
Starts a prediction for the server. '/help predict' for more help
The title of the prediction
The duration of how long the betting process will last. Enter a positive number. Time in seconds
(OPTIONAL) [DEFAULT: YES] - The positive outcome text
(OPTIONAL) [DEFAULT: NO] - The negative outcome text
Prediction currently running. Please finish the prediction with '/winner' or '/refund' the current bets.

> Prediction Started: **{competition_title}** - Betting submission Time Left: **{duration}**
```bash
Type /believe (amount) to bet on "{believe}"
Type /doubt (amount) to bet on "{doubt}"```
Command to bet for the positive outcome of a prediction
Command to bet for the negative outcome of a prediction
Amount you wish to bet for. Enter positive values only. Use '/points' to check your server points
{mention} you have already chosen your side for this prediction
{mention} you don't have enough points to make that bet
{mention} the prediction submission have ended! Waiting on outcome.
{mention} the prediction hasn't started! Either start a prediction or ask an admin in the channel to start one.
{mention} you have already chosen your side for this prediction
{mention} you don't have enough points to make that bet
{mention} the submission for the prediction have ended! Waiting on outcome.
{mention} the prediction hasn't started! Either start a prediction or ask an admin in the channel to start one.
{name} has bet {amount} in favor of "{title}"
{name} has bet {amount} in opposition of "{title}"
Issues a refund to all users and terminates the contest. Option to issue a refund to one person

> Prediction Closed: **{title}**
```bash
Users have been refunded their points ```
Nothing to refund! No prediction running.
Declares the winner of the prediction. Ask for which side won the prediction
Choose between the Believer's side or the Doubter's side to win the prediction

Prediction Closed: **{title}**
Results: **{believe_title} - #{believe_amount} ({believe_percent}%)** vs. ({doubt_percent}%) #{doubt_amount} - {doubt_title}

Prediction Closed: **{title}**
Results: {believe_title} - #{believe_amount} ({believe_percent}%) vs. **({doubt_percent}%) #{doubt_amount} - {doubt_title}**
Ending contest. Nothing to declare a winner on! No bets made
Nothing to declare a winner on! No prediction running.
Allows you to check your current point total in the server
Hey {mention}! You seem to have {amount}.
Allows you to check your total bet amount
Hey {mention}! You seem to have bet {amount}. Hopefully you win
{mention}, you seem to not have placed a bet. '/believe' or '/doubt
Show the top 5 Points holders for the server
Not Allowed!
Guild: {guild}, User: {name} (ID: {id}) is betting {amount} Points in favour of the prediction
Guild: {guild}, User: {name} (ID: {id}) is betting {amount} Points against the prediction

For user: {display_name} (ID: {id}) triggered the error:
